instrs[  0] = 0b0000101010000001100000000000000000010001000000000000000000001111;//mov <PE_REG[3]> 0x33221100 #1111 
instrs[  1] = 0b0000101010000001000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001111;//mov <PE_REG[2]> d0 #1111 
instrs[  2] = 0b0000101010000000100000000000000000000000000000010000000000001111;//mov <PE_REG[1]> d1 #1111 
instrs[  3] = 0b1100100000000000100010000110000000000000000001110000000000001111;//opt <PE_REG[1]> <PE_REG[2]> <PE_REG[3]> #111 #1111 
instrs[  4] = 0b1111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111;//done
